summary: Federal agencies can save money on services like payroll and travel by consolidating and sharing them with other agencies. The Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) uses a working capital fund to simplify how it pays for shared services. The division that administers the fund analyzes HUD’s business processes and recommends ways to use shared services more efficiently. But HUD hasn't assessed how these...
title: Working Capital Fund: HUD Could Improve Management to Better Achieve Efficiencies and Help Ensure Customer Satisfaction
